# What's new in 2.1.0

# Speed and more speed

Through a mix of behind-the-scenes changes and few new API extensions we have improved a lot on the speed issue. As a driving example we used a NLP taks, collocations, borrowed from the Cloudera blog. It's simple, we didn't make it up and we knew it covered some of the weaknesses of 2.0.
